entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:43AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG WINDS AND HIGHER SURF ALONG BRISTOL BAY AND KUSKOKWIM DELTA COAST MONDAY... A unseasonably strong low is expected to track through the eastern Bering Sea Sunday night.
